name: qdirstat
description: [QDirStat]({{ project_url }}) Qt-based directory statistics: KDirStat without any KDE -- from the author of the original KDirStat.

env.description: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

volumes.description: Users home directory in the container, stores qdirstat settings and scans.
Data you want to analyze disk usage information of.

readme-vars.project_blurb: [QDirStat]({{ project_url }}) Qt-based directory statistics: KDirStat without any KDE -- from the author of the original KDirStat.

param_env_vars.desc: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

param_volumes.desc: Users home directory in the container, stores qdirstat settings and scans.

readme-vars.app_setup_block:
The application can be accessed at:

* http://yourhost:3000/

By default the user/pass is abc/abc, if you change your password or want to login manually to the GUI session for any reason use the following link:

* http://yourhost:3000/?login=true
